title: Mussel and prawn linguine
ingredients: ['200 to 250g linguine pasta', '10 sprays garlic spray oil', '90g mixed peppers, chopped', '100g cooked prawns', '100g cooked mussel meat', '1 (10g) small chilli', '1 to 2 pinches dried chilli flakes', '1 to 2 pinches garlic salt', '1 to 2 pinches ground black pepper', '1 ot 2 pinches chopped fresh chives']
